Wonsan Stock Farm Inaugurated 
   Wonsan, November 12 (KCNA) -- The splendid Wonsan Stock Farm was completed.
 The combined stock farm raising goats, rabbits, pigs, ducks and geese will supply quantities of meat and milk products to working people.    
 Its inaugural ceremony was held on Nov. 12.
